title: UK Sophisticated Nottingham Escape in City Centre
description: Follow the spirited locals of Nottingham in search of hilltop heritage sites, eclectic music and vibrant venues with a stay at Crowne Plaza Nottingham, an IHG Hotel. Stroll where your heart takes you in the city made famous by Robin Hood - from high-end shopping to the Theatre Royal Concert Hall, it's all within reach. Indulge in locally sourced steak and gourmet fish and chips at Swatch Restaurant or experience a blissful treatment at Urban Escape Spa.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Nottingham, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Wollaton Street, Nottingham NG1 5RH, United Kingdom

title: Modern Nottingham Retreat Ten Minutes from Medieval Centre
description: Indulge in a stay at the Holiday Inn Nottingham, an IHG Hotel, a comfortable and modern retreat close to the city centre. Nottingham is a charming and thriving countryside city with spirited energy thanks to the university student population, and boasting a vibrant music and cuisine scene. Explore the historic cobblestoned streets lined with medieval architecture before returning to enjoy a hearty meal at the onsite Eatonâ€™s Brasserie restaurant with an al fresco dining space.
location_description: Holiday Inn Nottingham, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Castle Bridge Road, Nottingham NG7 1GX, United Kingdom
